data.oai_dc:dc: North American Landscape Characterization (NALC), 1970s BES ID 215-

1970s North American Landscape Characterization (NALC), part of the Mid-Atlantic Integrated Assessment (MAIA). The resolution of this dataset is 120m x 120m. The primary source of data for this project was Landsat MSS data acquired primarily in 1970's. Most of the data sets were acquired in 1973, but a few scenes from 1974, 1975 and 1976 were also used. More infomation can be found in the enclosed documentation. This dataset is the basis for the "change_70_90" dataset that documents change from the 1970s to the 1990s. Only limited metadata exists for this dataset, the UVM Spatial Analysis Lab has attempted to construct full metadata.
